None.Name: Tainted Infection
None.Description: Activate to spread the Twilight Curse on the entire map. Every unit played out within the next 20 seconds will be turned into Twilight Pest and spawned as a bug. They will initially deal 30% less damage for 20 seconds but will be retransformed to into their actual form after the effect wears off. Reusable every 60 seconds.
